content: I'm looking for some advice on choosing a new desk for my home office. I've been using a temporary one that's too small, and it's affecting my productivity. I've found a few options online that I like, but I want to check them out in person this weekend. Do you have any tips on what to consider when buying a desk? By the way, I just got a new bed frame from IKEA a while back, a MALM one in white, and I love it.
